title: So FF14 just released "active player info" and I am kind of amazed
body:
So I realize this is in japanese but let me give some context:

These are fucking low numbers. Nuff said.

That <200k finish on 3.1's story though.
only 5,000 level 60s give or take on popular servers.


http://livedoor.blogimg.jp/luckybancho/imgs/0/1/015a1b82.png
